articles.author: PTI
articles.title: If harmed, India will not spare anyone, says Rajnath Singh in a strong message to China - The Indian Express
articles.description: Singh, in his address to the Indian-American community in San Francisco, also sent a subtle message to the US that New Delhi does not believe in a diplomacy of “zero-sum game” and its relationship with one country cannot be at the expense of the other.
articles.content: In a strong message to China, Defence Minister Rajnath Singh has said that if harmed, India will not spare anyone, as he asserted that India under Prime Minister Narendra Modi has emerged as a powerf… [+5067 chars]

articles.title: 'India celebrated my ouster': Imran Khan repeats 'foreign conspiracy' charge - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former Pakistan PM and PTI chairman Imran Khan claimed last night that India celebrated his ouster and repeated the foreign conspiracy charge. Addressing thousands of his supporters in Peshawar, Imran Khan not only lashed America and new Pakistan govt, but al…
